《军团要塞：经典》
Team Fortress Classic

简介&游玩感想：“一款1996年正式以金源引擎出道的hl-mod，即使这个板块原定的TF2-Brotherhood（兄弟连）没有推出，作者依然以模型重置的方式加入到了TFC中（1.5更新）；说来奇怪，但TFC的玩法和机制相较于后辈（现在的TF2），更加硬核，这也是自半条命HL的死亡竞赛DM有了团队游戏这个概念后，第一款正式以“团队游戏”为主题出道的Oldschool-FPS（传统FPS），所以各方面对“团队游戏”这个概念强调的很多，这也是团队配合与战术第一次在游戏中大放异彩，值得令人铭记。”—至今为止，不谈TF这个ip（虽说TF1-doom mod源于1993），光说TFC就已有26年多的诞生时长了（还差4年马上30周年），（TF2也15年多了，小声）在此，向老游戏致敬，即使现在潮流变更风格变更，但你们这些在历史洪流中诞生的作品，是一代人的回忆与标志，更希望的是不仅于此了之，而是不断传承，即使未来再怎么变，也希望你们能在游戏业界中“耀眼星辰”，即使在不被人注视的群星一落，也自始至终的闪耀着，指引着后世之人…

实际体验：游戏特色依然是那些“cool stuff”，到处都是爆炸物（爆炸贝友情指导）、连跳机制、各种爆炸跳（还可以让队友把你炸起来）、60s-80s军事化及特种部队题材（然后经典穿插未来科技狂想曲-激光枪、EMP、传送装置、双管minigun）等，除此以外、你的载弹量还十分充足（指死了说不定才打完1/4，暗示比TF2多了至少一倍），即使如此炫酷，但因为TFC强悍的护甲系统（怀疑是曼恩公司历代智慧结晶了），你会遇见以下情况（SOL：4发火箭直击带不走一个HWguy机枪手、3发带不走同行SOL士兵、两发带不走DEMO爆破手以及其他低血量低甲兵种），然后惊鸿一瞥，Engineer工程师制造的步哨枪尤其是补给器自毁时，却能秒天秒地秒全几乎部的满血满甲兵种（以及他的EMP特殊手雷）；所以由此可见，在TFC中，没有明确的进攻与防守单位（除了侦查、火焰兵这种没有重型霰弹枪的纯辅助工具人兵种），当然、起机枪手另说←机枪手是TFC里最强(玩赖)的兵种，远近通吃，甚至可以站2fort塔台和狙击手对枪，对方不是枪枪爆头就直接寄（笑）;话题转回来，这么多的介绍无非只是想强调一件事：“在TFC里杀人不容易”，想要达成这个目标你要带领个战术小队（队友爆炸物、霰弹枪先破甲，然后等对手没甲了再强攻，不然真的打不动）
俗称：“在TFC中，只有群殴才是主流，想打败一个对手至少要正义的2v1才呈现出优势”（TFC继承兄弟连说，确信）

以上，致敬经典的TFC以及Old—school游戏xD
It's just not fun, atleast it led to the best multiplayer game of all time

It was good back in the day, but now in 2022 it's just... old. Not like TF2 where it ages like... what's the saying again? Something about wine. Anyways, it isn't good. It's confusing, and the controls are weird. Not good.

To be fair to this game even though it was made in the 90's it still holds up relatively well for a game of that era. This game was the pioneer for TF2 one of, if not the best games to date, I will always value it for that the most if anything. The only problem with TF2 replacing it and it being so old is there is barely any non bot servers to play on, I searched for about an hour just to find one human match, which is bad, but better than some other dead games tbh. I will recommend this game as it is an experience which doesn't cost a lot and is such a piece of history for valve, and TF2, plus it's not that bad of a game.
TFC Over 20 years old still the of the best games i've ever played

dont know why this cost money

If you're familiar with Team Fortress 2, I doubt you'll like this game. I certainly don't. The classes all feel less polished to play (especially Spy), and grenades provide an entirely different metagame than what you're used to. You essentially have to rewire your brain just to comprehend what's going on.

If you really want to try getting into the original Team Fortress, I would recommend playing Fortress Forever instead... you know, if it had any active servers left.
Its a good game, once you download and start it, it may be difficult navigating around the map but once you got the hang of it, the games alright.
прикольная игра, правда не знаю как играть. 10/10

Balanced better than TF2, more chaotic, a bit less players, a lot less bots (bots are only used to imitate players and fill up teams on some servers), and most importantly - NO COSMETICS! 

TFC's gameplay is much different than TF2's, a clear example of it is the presence of grenades of almost every class, and the loadouts. Pyro has a rocket launcher, medic has 2 shotguns, spy has a nailgun and engineer has a laser gun! 

Definetely runs better than TF2 on my 2006 ASUS laptop, but that doesn't change how I perform in-game. The skill ceiling reaches space, and it's hard for a beginner to score above 3 points in one match.

The characters might be kess iconic and not resemble their comic counterparts, but they still have great design and are simply nice to look at.
